name: 21 Solitaire
description: 21 Solitaire is a Black Jack variation with 4 different game modes. The game includes basic modes for beginners and casino gameplay including side bets for the more advanced players. This game features 3 different themes that give you a fresh and tropical look at the game. Play the different game modes to beat your highest scores and earn achievement medals by getting unique hands. 21 Solitaire is a combination of luck and strategy.
